044package org.jfree.data.xy;
045
046import org.jfree.data.DomainOrder;
047import org.jfree.data.general.AbstractSeriesDataset;
048
049/**
050 * An base class that you can use to create new implementations of the
051 * {@link XYDataset} interface.
052 */
053public abstract class AbstractXYDataset extends AbstractSeriesDataset
054        implements XYDataset {
055
056    /**
057     * Returns the order of the domain (X) values.
058     *
059     * @return The domain order.
060     */
061    @Override
062    public DomainOrder getDomainOrder() {
063        return DomainOrder.NONE;
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Returns the x-value (as a double primitive) for an item within a series.
068     *
069     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
070     * @param item  the item index (zero-based).
071     *
072     * @return The value.
073     */
074    @Override
075    public double getXValue(int series, int item) {
076        double result = Double.NaN;
077        Number x = getX(series, item);
078        if (x != null) {
079            result = x.doubleValue();
080        }
081        return result;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Returns the y-value (as a double primitive) for an item within a series.
086     *
087     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
088     * @param item  the item index (zero-based).
089     *
090     * @return The value.
091     */
092    @Override
093    public double getYValue(int series, int item) {
094        double result = Double.NaN;
095        Number y = getY(series, item);
096        if (y != null) {
097            result = y.doubleValue();
098        }
099        return result;
100    }
101
102}
